text:
[Verse]
Candy hearts so sweet
In my hand they beat
Colors in the air
Love it everywhere

[Verse 2]
Pink and blue and green
In a sugar dream
Whispers on my tongue
Springtime in my lungs

[Chorus]
Oh we taste the love tonight
Candy hearts in every bite
Dancing in this sugar light
Everything just feels so right

[Verse 3]
Messages of cheer
Wishes all sincere
Smiles in every piece
Happiness won't cease

[Verse 4]
Holding you so close
You're my sweetest dose
In this sugar world
You’re my loving pearl

[Chorus]
Oh we taste the love tonight
Candy hearts in every bite
Dancing in this sugar light
Everything just feels so right
title: Candy Hearts
